relationships.description: Publisher inviting guests to celebrate author's book launch
Publisher hosting book launch event for author

analysis.purpose: To invite recipients to a book launch party for Michael Wolff's new book 'SIEGE: Trump Under Fire'
analysis.significance: Standard publishing industry event invitation for a prominent political author

blackmail_indicators.description: Standard professional event invitation with no indicators of coercion or blackmail

illegal_activity.description: Standard event invitation with no illegal activity mentioned or implied

details: Book launch for Michael Wolff, a journalist/author writing about Trump administration

public_knowledge.context: Michael Wolff is a well-known journalist and author who wrote controversial books about the Trump administration; book launches are typically public events

analysis.summary: This is an email invitation from Stephen Rubin of Henry Holt publishing for a book launch party celebrating Michael Wolff's new book 'SIEGE: Trump Under Fire' scheduled for June 3, 2019, at 15 West 67th Street in New York.
